data.comment: Riccieli (Famalicao) has been booked during the half time break!
In the minute -3, Nuno Santos (Sporting) has been booked during the half time break!
The big names in today's match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Famalicao get the game underway.
In the minute 1, Sporting to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Sporting a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leonardo Campana is booked for the home team.
Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 12, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Sporting throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 13, Zouhair Feddal's header is off-target for Sporting.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Famalicao's area.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting just outside Famalicao's area.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Throw-in high up the field for Sporting in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Famalicao needs to be cautious. Sporting have an attacking throw-in.
Sporting have been awarded a penalty in Vila Nova de Famalicao...
Sporting are awarded a penalty ... Nuno Santos botches the spot kick!
In the minute 23, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Sporting's Pedro Goncalves has been booked in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Famalicao's area.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
In the minute 27, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Joao Palhinha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sporting.
In the minute 32, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
The match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luiz Junior, who is down injured.
Famalicao's Luiz Junior is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Pedro Goncalves.
In the minute 37, That's a fine assist from Luis Neto.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
In the minute 39, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Sporting throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
In the minute 41, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Famalicao.
In the minute 43, Gustavo Assuncao scores with his head for Famalicao to level the match at 1-1.
Jordao instrumental with a fine assist.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Sporting.
In the minute 45, Famalicao will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sporting.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Joaquin Pereyra (Famalicao) has received a yellow card from Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Pedro Porro puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Sporting kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
Pedro Goncalves of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Sporting are pushing forward but Nuno Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 49, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Sporting a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Famalicao throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 53, Free kick in a good position for Sporting!
Joao Palhinha for Sporting drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho waits before resuming play because Joao Palhinha for Sporting is still down.
In the minute 60, Joao Neto is replacing Ruben Lameiras for the home team.
The home team replace Joaquin Pereyra with Ivan Jaime.
Famalicao make their third substitution with Marcello Trotta replacing Leonardo Campana.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Joao Palhinha returns to the field for Sporting after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick Sporting.
In the minute 63, Ruben Amorim is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Tiago Tomas replacing Andraz Sporar.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Sporting needs to be cautious. Famalicao have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Famalicao needs to be cautious. Sporting have an attacking throw-in.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Sporting attack through Joao Mario. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Assuncao for Famalicao has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Can Sporting capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 72, The away team have replaced Nuno Santos with Bruno Tabata. This is the second substitution made today by Ruben Amorim.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Sebastian Coates (Sporting) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Srdan Babic (Famalicao) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Free kick Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao.
In the minute 77, Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting are coming forward and Joao Mario gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Famalicao have a goal kick.
Sporting's Pedro Porro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Famalicao a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Pedro Goncalves has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Matheus Nunes is on a sub for Joao Mario for Sporting.
Cristian Borja is replacing Vitorino Antunes for the away team.
Patrick William is replacing Jordao for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 82, Jhonata Robert is on a sub for Riccieli for Famalicao.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 83, At Estadio Municipal de Famalicao, Jhonata Robert has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
Throw-in for Sporting close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Famalicao's area.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 87, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Joao Palhinha (Sporting) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Goal! Jhonata Robert equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Sporting.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao drive forward through Fernando Valenzuela. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Zouhair Feddal for Sporting has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
